document.full_text: the tampa bay lightning rebounded from a three-goal deficit by scoring five times in the final two periods to strike down the boston bruins 5-3 in game four on saturday.
document.title: lightning level series by striking down the bruins
lines_and_colors: the tampa bay lightning rebounded from a three-goal deficit by scoring five times in the final two periods to strike down the boston bruins 5-3 in game four on saturday.
